column5: 58. First trip to Canada when I was 41. Have not missed a year since.
I will be 69 in July. First trip to Canada was in 1955. Headed for Lac Seul twice this year and to Wisconsin in July with my wife and Grandson. Mike Kansas
60 , have been going 29 straight years . If you didn't know how old you are , how old would you be ?

We've had several youngsters in our cabin for walleye openers in past years, but they are finding other things to do. This May the youngest is 59 and he's a whole lot younger than the rest of us. I missed out on early fishing trips to Ontario with my parents due to playing baseball. Made my first trip to North Channel in 1959 at age 25. Was hooked deeply and returned for a 7 weeks stay June 1960.

I'm 36 and I completely agree with you. Outside of my group of buddies, I don't personally know ANYONE under the age of 55 that takes fishing trips , let alone to Canada. And if I didn't plan our trips, I don't think my buddies would go. I've also noticed that I don't see kids and teenagers fishing for trout in the local streams like I used to. Its a shame.

I'm 64 been fishing the same area of Lake Of The Woods since 1962. Now have my own place and spend the summers. With this cold and damp weather we've been having I'm not sure about this year due to arthritis, not even sure I could hold a fishing rod.
43 I believe. I fish with my dad 80, brothers 61 and 57, nephews 39,37,36 friends 44-25. Most of my friends are all younger than me From 25-40 so maybe that's why I think I'm younger than I am. Lol
59- hip & knee joints 69-brain 39. That's a big problem sometimes.
How old are all of you guys? I am 25 and love the up north trips. So how old are you guys?
My age? Keeps changing everyday. 53 and retired.No longer go to Canada. Go to Devils Lake, ND instead. Cheaper and get to bring more fish home!
In my mind I'm 39, when I shave and look in mirror I'm 65. I'm not quitting so look out. Paul
I'm 33 and the outdoors folks in our age group are a dying breed, Im sad to say. Of all my friends only I Fish and Hunt.
41 yrs. Born in 72 and have been fishing Lac Seul since 82. Lots of memories. Started taking my son at age 10. This will be his 4th trip coming in June.
47, this year will be my 24th wedding anniversary and my 24th Canadian trip. I started taking my son when he was 10 and he is now 13.
